name: Kahoots Creative Group
tagline: UX Design and Web Development - Get in Kahoots!
description:
We are a digital consulting group that specializes in design, development and marketing support.
Rooted in the principles of design thinking, we work with brands to evolve their digital presence and create more value for their customers.
Whether we are using technology to solve everyday problems or answering the big marketing questions of the day, We’re here to make your life easier and your brand better.
So if you are looking to work with smart, creative, no-nonsense people, then you might want to get in Kahoots!
